title: New York points the finger at the feds for scuttled offshore wind solicitation
description: The New York State Energy Research and Development Authority will not award any proposals in its fifth offshore wind solicitation, citing federal disruptions impacting project development.
content: The New York State Energy Research and Development Authority will not award any proposals in its fifth offshore wind solicitation, citing federal disruptions impacting project development.
